user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screen shows a smartphone's home screen with a pink gradient background. At the top, the date ("Wednesday, Nov 9"), the weather condition (cloudy), and the temperature (46°F) are displayed. Below, there are several app icons: YouTube, Messages, Gmail, Chrome, and Google Photos. A Google search bar is located at the bottom of the screen.
